name: Chathuranga de Silva
bio: Pinnaduwage Chaturanga de Silva (born 17 January 1990), or Chaturanga de Silva, is a professional Sri Lankan. Chathuranga de Silva was educated at St.Aloysius College, Galle, where he started his cricket career. his younger brother wanidu hasaranga.cricketer plays for limited over internationals for Sri Lanka. He is primarily a left-handed batsman but bowls handy slow left-arm orthodox. He has represented the Sri Lanka cricket team in limited over international matches.
